void PWRCU_BODCmd ( ControlStatus  NewState)

Enable or Disable BOD reset function.

Parameters:
NewState,:This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 508 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_BODRISConfig ( PWRCU_BODRIS_Enum  Selection)

Select when the BOD occurs, the action for the cause Reset or Interrupt.

Parameters:
Selection,:BOD reset or interrupt selection. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • PWRCU_BODRIS_RESET : Reset the whole chip
  • PWRCU_BODRIS_INT : Assert interrupt
Return values:
None

Definition at line 531 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

Waits, until the PWRCU can be accessed.

Return values:
PWRCU_TIMEOUTor PWRCU_OK

Definition at line 136 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_DeepSleep1 ( PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum  SleepEntry)

Enter DEEP-SLEEP Mode 1.

Parameters:
SleepEntry: Enters sleep mode instruction that is used to WFI or WFE. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE : Enters SLEEP mode via WFE instruction
  • PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFI : Enters SLEEP mode via WFI instruction
Return values:
None

Return values:

Definition at line 559 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

PWRCU_DMOSStatus PWRCU_GetDMOSStatus ( void  )

Return the DMOS status.

Return values:
Thisfunction will return one of the following values:
  • PWRCU_DMOS_STS_ON : DMOS on
  • PWRCU_DMOS_STS_OFF : DMOS off
  • PWRCU_DMOS_STS_OFF_BY_BODRESET : DMOS off caused by brow out reset

Definition at line 571 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

u16 PWRCU_GetFlagStatus ( void  )

Return the flags of PWRCU.

Return values:
Thisfunction will return one of the following:
  • 0x0000 : There is no flag is set.
  • 0x0001 (PWRCU_FLAG_PWRPOR) : VDD power domain power-on reset flag has been set.
  • 0x0002 (PWRCU_FLAG_PD) : Power-Down flag has been set.
  • 0x0010 (PWRCU_FLAG_POR) : Power-on reset flag has been set.
  • 0x0100 (PWRCU_FLAG_WUP0) : External WAKEUP0 pin flag has been set.
  • 0x0200 (PWRCU_FLAG_WUP1) : External WAKEUP1 pin flag has been set.

Definition at line 161 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

Return values:

Definition at line 550 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_HSIReadyCounterBitLengthConfig ( PWRCU_HSIRCBL_Enum  BitLength)

Configure HSI ready counter bit length.

Parameters:
BitLength,:HSI ready counter bit length. This parameter can be one of following:
  • PWRCU_HSIRCBL_4 : 4 bits
  • PWRCU_HSIRCBL_5 : 5 bits
  • PWRCU_HSIRCBL_6 : 6 bits
  • PWRCU_HSIRCBL_7 : 7 bits (Default)
Return values:
None

Definition at line 827 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_LDOConfig ( PWRCU_LDOMODE_Enum  Sel)

Configure the LDO operation mode.

Parameters:
Sel,:Specify the LDO mode. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • PWRCU_LDO_NORMAL : The LDO is operated in normal current mode
  • PWRCU_LDO_LOWCURRENT : The LDO is operated in low current mode
Return values:
None

u32 PWRCU_ReadBackupRegister ( PWRCU_BAKREG_Enum  BAKREGx)

Return the value of specified backup register.

Parameters:
BAKREGx,:Number of backup register. Where x can be 0 ~ 9.
Returns:
Between 0x0 ~ 0xFFFFFFFF.

Definition at line 172 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_SetLVDS ( PWRCU_LVDS_Enum  Level)

Configure LVD voltage level.

Parameters:
Level,:Low voltage detect level. This parameter can be one of the following: VDD 2.0 ~ 3.6V version:
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V25 : 2.25 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V4 : 2.40 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V55 : 2.55 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V7 : 2.70 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V85 : 2.85 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V : 3.00 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V15 : 3.15 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V3 : 3.30 V VDD 1.65 ~ 3.6V version:
  • PWRCU_LVDS_1V75 : 1.75 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_1V95 : 1.95 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V15 : 2.15 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V35 : 2.35 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V55 : 2.55 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V75 : 2.75 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V95 : 2.95 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V15 : 3.15 V VDD 5.0V version:
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V65 : 2.65 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_2V85 : 2.85 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V05 : 3.05 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V25 : 3.25 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_3V45 : 3.45 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_4V25 : 4.25 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_4V45 : 4.45 V
  • PWRCU_LVDS_4V65 : 4.65 V
Return values:
None

Definition at line 475 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_Sleep ( PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_Enum  SleepEntry)

Enter SLEEP mode.

Parameters:
SleepEntry: Enters sleep mode instruction that is used to WFI or WFE. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFE : Enters SLEEP mode via WFE instruction
  • PWRCU_SLEEP_ENTRY_WFI : Enters SLEEP mode via WFI instruction
Return values:
None

Definition at line 203 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_V15RDYSourceConfig ( PWRCU_V15RDYSC_Enum  Sel)

Configure VDD15 power good source.

Parameters:
Sel,:specifies VDD15 power good source. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • PWRCU_V15RDYSC_V33ISO : Vdd15 power good source come from V33_ISO bit in CKCU unit
  • PWRCU_V15RDYSC_V15POR : Vdd15 power good source come from Vdd15 power-on reset
Return values:
None

Definition at line 755 of file ht32f5xxxx_pwrcu.c.

void PWRCU_WriteBackupRegister ( PWRCU_BAKREG_Enum  BAKREGx,
u32  DATA 
)

Write the DATA to specified backup register.

Parameters:
BAKREGx: Number of backup registers. Where x can be 0 ~ 9.
DATA: Must between 0x0 ~ 0xFFFFFFFF.
Return values:
None
